One hint that you won’t get the job is if you are banned from that establishment after many employees accuse you of harassment. However, one trans-identified dude did not get the hint and found the nerve to claim this was transphobic or some other deranged lie. And the worst part is not that he sued the restaurant, it's that the New York State Division of Human Rights is siding with him solely because he woke up one day and claimed to feel some type of way.

Trans woman sues Hooters after they 'refus
title: Trans dude sues Hooters for not getting a job, even though he was harassing the Hooters girls

For some reason, people like Bill Gates demand you radically change everything about your life in the name of climate change. And although he has a far worse carbon footprint than you, don’t worry because he claims to have all the answers.

JD Vance: "One of my sort of core political beliefs is that our politics is focused on fake sh*t and distractions to distract us from real stuff." pic.twitter.com/bA1wWG7WYQ

title: JD Vance unloads on hacks like Bill Gates "getting rich off climate change and public health"

JD Vance crushed in on Joe Rogan, as we were all expecting him to. One of the topics was Joe Biden calling half of America garbage vs. Tony Hinchcliffe making a joke about Puerto Rico and/or one about watermelons.

To recap, Tony Hinchcliffe told a joke at a Trump rally last Sunday that critics called offensive and that both the Harris Campaign and the media (but I repeat myself) were planning to ride until Election Day. Then Joe Biden called half of the country he se
title: JD Vance shines on Joe Rogan, explains difference between Tony Hinchcliffe and Joe Biden slow enough for MSM to understand
